dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb complains of metastasizing text (4)
dmca.body:
Sir/Madam:

I write to complain about the webpage http://www.mesothelioma-informationsupport.com/article.php?id=017 and to ask that this site be removed from Google's search index. It infringes on the copyright owned by The David Law Firm, P.C.

This site copies our website's page http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm
The offending page is listed in the Google search index. A search for "www.mesotheliomainformation-support.com/article.php?id=017" brings it up.

According to whois information at the registrar BulkRegister, LLC, the contact for MESOTHELIOMA-INFORMATION-SUPPORT.COM is:

Administrative Contact
 [private]-> [private]@gmail.com
None
[private] Urb Puentelasierra Valdemorillo, Madrid 28660
ES
Phone  [private]
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com You can also reach me at

The David Law Firm, P.C.  [private] Austin, TX 78746
 [private]


Sincerely,
 
[private]
The David Law Firm
